roleset.name: search or inquire in a meddlesome way
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 35.6. Comparison to ‘ferret’. Roleset by Julia.

example.name: All args
example.text: I was nosing around the kitchen for something to make for my son's lunch.
example.arg: for something to make for my son's lunch.
